## R Markdown

Online Two Sample T Test with plot
Have YOU ever wanted a quick online tool where you can just upload your two sample files and get back a nice density plot representation and the t.test output?

Then this is the tool for you!


## The Problem



You have two samples

But how to do a bit of quick analysis and visualization without out all that tedious mucking about in RStudio?

## The Solution


data:  measure by sample
t = 0.98485, df = 174.22, p-value = 0.3261
alternative hypothesis: true difference in means is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 -0.4902879  1.4669285



## How to use this App


Create two data files containing 1 measurement per row (a header line is acceptable)


Use the file selectors to upload your data files and press 'Go!'
